## Basic slide syntax

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}
To create slides, you create sections 
with `#`, titles with `##`, and bullets 
with `-`.

### Content types

- You can add several types of content
    - code (use backticks)
    - images
    - diagrams
    - tables
    - etc.
:::

::: {.column}

To create slides, you create sections 
with `#`, titles with `##`, and bullets 
with `-`.

Quarto will render your content in slide form.

### Content types

    - code (use backticks)
    - images
